faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions

how_to_start.question: How do I start using the app?
how_to_start.answer: To begin, go to Settings > My Jobs and add your first job. Set up schedules, location and rates. Then you can start tracking time from the main screen.

record_time.question: How do I record my work time?
record_time.answer: From the main screen, select your job and press the start button. The app will automatically track your time. Press stop when you're finished.

edit_records.question: Can I edit my time records?
edit_records.answer: Yes, go to the calendar and select any day to view your records. You can edit entry time, exit time and add notes.

geolocation.question: How does geolocation work?
geolocation.answer: The app uses your location to verify you're at your workplace. You can configure a tolerance radius in each job's settings.

billing_setup.question: How do I set up billing?
billing_setup.answer: In each job, go to the "Billing" tab and set your hourly rate. The app will automatically calculate your earnings based on time worked.

data_security.question: Is my data secure?
data_security.answer: All your data is stored locally on your device. We don't send personal information to external servers.

export_data.question: Can I export my data?
export_data.answer: We're coming soon with PDF and Excel export functionality for your time records.

location_issues.question: Why isn't location working?
location_issues.answer: Verify you've granted location permissions to the app. Go to Device Settings > Privacy > Location and enable permissions.
